tool_description: The TransLoc PublicAPI is a RESTful API which allows you to incorporate real-time vehicle tracking information into your web or mobile applications. It exposes several resources that allow you to access real-time information about transit systems tracked by TransLoc Inc.
name: OpenAPI 1.2
title: OpenAPI 1.2

api_list.name: Agencies
api_list.description: This resource contains a list of agencies along with their properties. It may be restricted by a geographical area filter, to retrieve only a list of agencies in a particular area of interest. It may also be restricted by agencies' IDs.

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: Format for the return value. One of ['json', 'jsonp'].

optional_parameters.name: agencies
optional_parameters.description: A list of agency IDs which to retrieve, seperated by comma.

api_list.name: Arrival Estimates
api_list.description: This resource contains a list of arrival estimates, separated by stops. When accessing this resource you must specify either a list of agencies, a list of routes or a list of stops.

required_parameters.name: agencies
required_parameters.description: A list of agency IDs which to retreive

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: Format for the return value. One of ['json', 'jsonp'].

optional_parameters.name: routes
optional_parameters.description: A list of route IDs for which to retrieve the arrival estimates.

optional_parameters.name: stops
optional_parameters.description: A list of stop IDs for which to retrieve the arrival estimates.

api_list.name: Segments
api_list.description: This resource contains a list of all the segments that are required to visualize routes. It must be restricted by agencies' ID's. It may be restricted by a geographical area filter, to retreive only a list of segments in a particular area. It may also be restricted by route ID's.

required_parameters.name: agencies
required_parameters.description: A list of agency IDs which to retrieve, seperated by comma.

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: Format for the return value. One of ['json', 'jsonp'].

optional_parameters.name: routes
optional_parameters.description: A list of route IDs which to retreive

api_list.name: Vehicles
api_list.description: This resource contains a list of vehicle, their properties and their locations. It must be restricted by agencies' IDs. It may be further restricted by a geographical area filter, to retrieve only the list of routes in a particular area of interest. It may also be restricted by a list of route ID's.

required_parameters.name: agencies
required_parameters.description: A list of agency IDs which to retreive

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: Format for the return value. One of ['json', 'jsonp'].

optional_parameters.name: routes
optional_parameters.description: A list of route IDs for which to retrieve the vehicles, separated by comma.

api_list.name: Routes
api_list.description: This resource contains a list of routes. It must be restricted by agencies' IDs. It may be restricted by a geographical area filter, to retrieve only a list of routes in a particular area.

required_parameters.name: agencies
required_parameters.description: A list of agency IDs which to retrieve, seperated by comma.

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: Format for the return value. One of ['json', 'jsonp'].

api_list.name: Stops
api_list.description: This resource contains a list of stops. It must be restricted by agencies' IDs. It may be restricted by a geographical area filter, to retreive only a list of stops in a particular area.

required_parameters.name: agencies
required_parameters.description: A list of agency IDs which to retreive

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: Format for the return value. One of ['json', 'jsonp'].
